item.title: Voters gave 'mandate' for progressive agenda: Mamdani
item.description: Mayor-elect Zohran Mamdani appeared Wednesday on "Good Morning America."

item.title: WATCH: The 2025 NYC Marathon’s last finisher might be its most inspiring
item.description: Juan Pablo Dos Santos was told he’d never walk again. This weekend, he finished the 2025 NYC Marathon in last place, in 15:21, to cheers as loud as th...

item.title: WATCH: Tate McRae caught singing into upside-down mic
item.description: Pop star Tate McRae had a viral moment after performing into the wrong end of her microphone.

item.title: Driver in custody after striking pedestrians in France, interior minister says
item.description: Interior Minister Laurent Nunez said a suspect was in custody.

item.title: WATCH: Fireball from deadly UPS plane crash in Louisville caught on camera
item.description: A UPS cargo plane crashed shortly after takeoff in Louisville, Kentucky killing at least seven people.
